drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.instruction: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

drinks.name: Sidecar
drinks.instruction: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: GG
drinks.instruction: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

drinks.name: A1
drinks.instruction: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.
pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

drinks.name: Adam
drinks.instruction: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: AT&T
drinks.instruction: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir.

drinks.name: Acid
drinks.instruction: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

drinks.name: H.D.
drinks.instruction: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

drinks.name: Smut
drinks.instruction: Throw it all together and serve real cold.
